ygData.subject: Re: Cleric's and PvP
ygData.msgSnippet: I am NOT PVP However, I have accidentally cast a heael on the mob I am fighting. it doesn t work. I hear that casting See invisible on a mob works though. ...
ygData.messageBody:
I am NOT PVP However, I have accidentally cast a heael on the mob I am
fighting. it doesn't work.

I hear that casting See invisible on a mob works though.

On Mon, 23 Aug 1999, Chas Watkins wrote:

> From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
>
> Has anyone tried healing or buffing a NPC or a MOB. I play a Cleric on
> Rallos Zek (PvP) and my main rationale is I like to heal. I play a "good"
> cleric and have healed bad/good races. My main irritation is when I'm
> suddenly PK'd by a member of my own race. (High Elf. I hang my head in shame
> at my fallen brothers and sisters)
>
> Anyway normally there is a +/- 4 range for PvP correct? It seems to me that
> the Cleric is uniquely positioned so that we can severely inconvenience
> other players far below our level. If they are fighting a MOB can we heal
> the MOB? Can we buff it? I must admit I have never tried it, I just thought
> of it. Has anyone any experience of this??
>
> Regards
>
> Nynenom of Rallos Zek
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> ONElist: the best place to EXPLORE topics, SHARE ideas, and
> CONNECT to people with the same interests.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>

Sarah sarah@...
===================================================
My picture of the world is of masses of people extending gifts to other
people, doing favors -- but nobody keeping score. -- Dr. Whitsett
===================================================
